title: Prepared Zambos with Chicken
ingredients: 1 red onion, cut into julienne strips
instructions: Step 1: Heat margarine in a saucepan and fry garlic and onion over medium heat.
Step 2: Add the chicken and brown for a few minutes. Add the tomato sauce and bouillon and cook for 2 minutes.
Step 3: To prepare the onions, mix them in a bowl and let them macerate for a few minutes.
Step 4: To prepare the sauce, mix everything in a bowl.
Step 5: To assemble the Zambos®, place them on a plate or open the bag horizontally.
Step 6: Add the chicken, then the cabbage, follow with the onions, and finally serve the dressing.
